website_summaries.verdict: The Zune HD delivers one of the best portable music and video experiences money can buy. At a time when many people have shifted their focus to games and applications, providing a killer media experience may not be enough for potential Zune buyers.
pros: The Zune HD's brilliant OLED display, HD Radio tuner, long battery life, movie rentals, and subscription music integration finally give iPod expatriates something to shout about
cons: You still can't use the Zune with a Mac, Marketplace purchases require "Microsoft Points," video format support is limited, audio quality lacks advanced controls, you'll need to purchase a dock accessory for HD video output, application and game selection stinks, and the recommended music subscription plan puts the real-world cost higher than the iPod

customer_reviews.title: Love and miss this device
customer_reviews.text: This was a great investment for me in high school. It was fast, it was easy to interact with, and build my playlists. The battery life was great, and it was durable. My only complaint is that Microsoft stopped supporting it. :(
customer_reviews.author: Oki_BriTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Years later it is still better than the other mp3 players out there
customer_reviews.text: At the time this was far superior to the device offered by that fruit company, this thing was ahead of it's time and unfortunately it simply didn't tailor to the lowest common denominator consumer like the 'pod does. My 8 year old uses this thing still to this day, in my opinion the software used to sync music and videos is still superior to itunes. It's a shame that Microsoft just couldn't get the recipe tuned enough for a broader market. The device is still snappy and the UI is slick, the drive size is plenty for my kids' music and movies, it's just unfortunate there is no longer any more support.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W. Bawol

customer_reviews.title: Great product from Zune
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 2009 and it finally died 2017! I bought this as a main mp3 player, this is extremely lightweight and the battery stll last around 8 hrs from playing all day. It recently malfunctioned by not letting me upload music into my player, the audio jack doesnt recognize when i have unplugged the headphones which will play non stop untill it dies... Great product from Zune
customer_reviews.author: headphoneguy

customer_reviews.title: Wish they still made them
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fully functional and in great shape. My last zune survived several drops and withstood the test of time lasting over 10 years. So hopefully this one with be just as great. So far it is. I do have one complaint from a design aspect I do not know who thought of putting the headphone jack on the bottom but bad idea you have to unplug the headphones every time you disconnect from your sync cable annoying to say the least and probably puts more wear and tear on the headphone jack as a result.
customer_reviews.author: john rushing

customer_reviews.title: If you enjoy music, video or podcasts this is what you need
customer_reviews.text: I like the convenient size and features of this unit. I live in an area that plays country music everywhere you go: my Zune has saved my sanity while keeping my phone charged for phone calls and keeps my phone from "alerting" me while I'm enjoying my latest Amazon music downloads. It receives radio and has plenty of room for all of your music, video and podcasts. I also like not having to charge my phone multiple times a day.
customer_reviews.author: vptulsa

customer_reviews.title: Quite an impressive player, too bad Zune products have been discontnued
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Beautiful OLED Display -Crisp and flat response DSP -Ample storage for my collection -Decent battery life Cons: -MS Zune services were discontinued
customer_reviews.author: Soul_

customer_reviews.title: Music everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Since my new car has a mp3 player hook-up, it was time to get a player. CD shuttles are WAY too expensive and carrying CD's around becomes ridiculous. My 1st zune was returned with display fault - a gray/black line across the screen but Amazons return policy quickly replaced it. The zune seems to be "the business" rather than a trendy toy. Wireless connection works well and the occasional internet use is useful. I don't need video or apps but some photo portability is nice. Easy to use - I haven't read the instruction book at all. I had to get an in-car charger and audio cable to complete the portability. Very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Welg

customer_reviews.title: Not the Ipod..but what a great lil gizmo!
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the price this thing is an amazing lil music player but it does have 3 flaws. 1. The wireless is weak and eats battery life like I cant believe. 2.you cant use rhapsody or other music downloading sites, you have to use the Zune marketplace which is more expensive, that said it is really easy to use and I dont mind. 3. You cant watch videos online with it. Not a huge deal since its a fraction of the cost of an Ipod touch but still just a little more effort and this would have been an amazing device, as is...Well Im glad I bought it but next time ill save up and get the Ipod.
customer_reviews.author: Anakim_g

customer_reviews.title: Great, Great, Great!
customer_reviews.text: I won't write much as this product is no longer produced. I just want to put in my 2 cents that this is a great product. It isn't just the fact that it is a great music/video player, but also the music discovery is amazing. Smart DJ, recommended picks, related artists, and the social make this an amaizing music discovering machine. If you also get Zune pass, you'll be one happy camper. If you want apps, this isn't for you, but as a music lover, this is the way to go! (By the way, it works great as a video player and web surfing device as well)
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel's Buddy

customer_reviews.title: NO SOFTWARE SUPPORT
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. Don't give me wrong for the zune is the best mp3 player ever but I brought one in March 2019 it works well until now. My zune do not work and there is an error message C00D133C it will not come on and Microsoft is no help. Microsoft is saying they don't have the software for the zune any more. So why is Amazon selling the zune and there is no support for it ? Very expensive paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: lalgee2001

customer_reviews.title: after 2 days of having it, it turned off ...
customer_reviews.text: after 2 days of having it, it turned off and never turned back on. no matter how long i try to charge it. what a shame...
customer_reviews.author: Renae Bailey

customer_reviews.title: It stopped working after 3 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: It took me a few days and a lot of downloads to get my computer to the place where the Zune software recognized that the MP3 player was plugged in. That was extremely annoying. Once I got past that point, I was able to transfer my music with great ease. I enjoyed the Zune for two weeks and it powered off and never came back on. For the two weeks I used it I really enjoyed it, now I am truly bummed out that it won't work. Thank Heaven for Amazon's return policy, that is the only saving grace with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stubby

customer_reviews.title: Great Music Player
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a great way to listen to and discover new music the Zune HD is the one for you. In my opinion, this device does just what it purports to do, and that is why it got the 5 star rating. the display is pretty impressive, showing out a great depth of color not seen in other media devices. I would suggest buying a cover for the HD to keep it looking pristine, but so far I have had no problems. Given the chance, I would make the same decision to purchase the Zune HD again.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Trout

customer_reviews.title: It's a really good mp3 player If you can't stand (or can't afford) ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived here quickly. I didn't know it would be so small, but it's quite cute. It's a really good mp3 player If you can't stand (or can't afford) apple products. There are less restrictions on music than apple has and all my amazon music syncs up nicely
customer_reviews.author: wolfbane

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing to death till death do us part :D . its got an amazing screen and it feels very small and portable . and i like the UI of the zune and the software is amazing its very clean and crisp and organized which falls into the necessity of my needs . it play music great and video is amazing the internet is fast enough . and the touch is perfect . and the blacks are deep it fascinates me and the birhgts are bright i love it . faults...it wierd on me for a little bit until i restarted it but other than that it is good.
customer_reviews.author: redseasplitter

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: I've had the 32gb Zune HD for a couple days now. The good: it's easy to use wireless synch to PC is a nice feature sound quality is better than my iPod Nano the Zune software is light years ahead of iTunes it's lighter than the iTouch the screen looks better than the iTouch The not so good: No YouTube app yet no Flash support yet not a lot of apps yet Overall, I gave it 4 stars. If it had support for flash and the apps loaded faster, it would get a 5 star rating
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S.

customer_reviews.title: Zune HD is Slick
customer_reviews.text: If it hadn't been for my Zune 120 dying unexpectedly I wouldn't have purchased the HD any time soon because I was content with what I had. Little did I know that what I had was blown clear out of the water with the Zune HD! The graphics on this mp3 are impressive. Set up was a breeze and once it charged I had my music transferred quickly and with no problem. The sound quality is much better than my 120 and the HD channels are an extra plus. You won't be disappointed with this stylish and sleek mp3!
customer_reviews.author: R. Colley

customer_reviews.title: Fun Device!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very powerful and fun device. I had fun learning all the little tips and tricks in using the HD device. This is my fourth Zune device,(I currently own the 120 and the 80 gb zunes also)this one is my favorite although it has less storage space. the only annoying thing about it so far, is song titles and podcast titles are cut of in the playing now view, this could be resolved by adding the scrolling feature to playing now view, which the original 30 gb had. Other than that, this is a great and fun device. I love my Zune!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hairston

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Bought This Thing So Many Years Ago And It Still Works Flawlessly!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy C Audett

customer_reviews.title: Zune HD 32 GB
customer_reviews.text: The product work just as it is listed. I love the bright and colorful screen. Watching a movie or podcast on the screen is amazing. the touch screen work effectively. and responds to the touch perfectly. The sound quality of this device will amaze you. The bass has a great dept to it's low and a crispness to the highs. The Zune software work great it makes syncing your device; adding and removing content is a breeze. The device is very slim but sturdy in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Morris Donald

customer_reviews.title: Stands the test of time and still going stong
customer_reviews.text: This thing got some attention for the specs and design for its time and sadly was discontinued some years ago but surprisingly it still feels modern and sophisticated in my hand especially when firing up HD radio. This thing still performs and looks well for the age but music store and app downloads are not working for me since it was discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: vanilla9819

customer_reviews.title: Was good
customer_reviews.text: I loved zune still have mine unfortunately they are outdated now, but I still use mine.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola

customer_reviews.title: OK for music.
customer_reviews.text: I got this product thinking that it would be an awesome gadget to play games on, watch movies on, and listen to music. BUT... when I got it, I realized there were very few apps for it, and it's been a couple of years since I got it, and there's only been 2 additions to the apps library. If you buy a movie with a digital copy, you can't transfer it to the Zune HD. Pros: Good display for pictures, able to surf the internet while listening to music, and delete songs without having to connect to computer through USB. Cons: Can't play protected media, even with a license, Can't sync digital copy movies, fairly short battery life.
customer_reviews.author: chevyguy1191

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately lost my last zune and am not a huge fan of Apple products, so I really wanted to get another zune. I knew zunes had been discontinued, but was thrilled to discover that there were still some on here! This one came in perfect condition with all it's accessories and in it's original packaging. It holds a lot more music than my last zune and works wonderfully. It also arrived much sooner than expected which was a pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Shillo

customer_reviews.title: RIP
customer_reviews.text: I had this Zune for over three years. I loved it. I took care of it. I had so much good music on it. I had the cutest skin ever on it. It was my baby. Then, my boyfriend left my car unlocked and some heartless maniac stole it. I was devastated. Months later my car was broken into again, and my boyfriend's iPod was NOT taken. This should tell you something. Should have got a flippin' Zune.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Zune HD 32 GB Video MP3 Player (Platinum) Sold by Amazon.com LLC
customer_reviews.text: ITEM: Zune HD 32 GB Video MP3 Player (Platinum) SOLD BY: Amazon.com LLC BUY DATE: November 26, 2010 REVIEW DATE: 12/20/2013 My favorite stand along MP3 player. Too bad the zune didn't take off because I thought this was the best mp3 player I've owned. It however is the last mp3 player as I now use my smart phone. I choose the Zune because the Apple OS doesn't fit my eye.
customer_reviews.author: es

customer_reviews.title: Portable Prefection
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new Zune HD! Through Amazon I was able to purchase a new 32 gb Zune HD for a lower price then in any retail store and the shipping was fast and safe. I'm completely blow away by the slickness and overall design of the Zune HD. Perhaps I am bias as I am the owner of the original Zune 30 and loved that, so the new Zune is the same great experience amplified 10 fold. I only have one quibble,the lack of truly unique and useful apps available at launch. However, I'm sure, as Microsoft did with the previous incarnations, will offer new and exciting updates. In summary..5 out of 5!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Ryan Adam Asberry

customer_reviews.title: This item no longer works after only two months
customer_reviews.text: The item on lasted for two months no longer works and cost a lot of money. The seller would not even accommodate my request for a return, replacement or partial refund. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Candace A. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Fun.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: great sound quality, small, light weight, beautiful display, great battery life, fun/beautiful apps, wireless sync, responsive and quick, and it plays HD videos through a HDTV once you have the dock. Also it has a gorgeous, fun, and easy to use interface. Cons: There are only about 100 apps, so it could use more, especially a youtube app. No flash support.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived great, pretty fast shipping. The new software is a little less user friendly in my opinion. I wish the battery life held a little longer. I have to charge it every 2 days or so, using it about 2 hours a day or less. I cought it brand new, though. The screen picture is beautiful, thus it being a ZuneHD. I wish more apps were available. Overall, i am satisfied with my purchase. It's served me well. haha.
customer_reviews.author: jademarie

customer_reviews.title: Thought I was purchasing a brand new Zune. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was purchasing a brand new Zune. The Zune didn't come with the original instruction manual. Instead it came with a typed up vague instructions on how to operate the Zune. Had to go online to figure out how to operate and download the Zune application which wasn't in the typed up instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Great little player
customer_reviews.text: It is little...almost shockingly so. I expected it to be bigger and heavier, so this is not a bad thing. The screen resolution and clarity is amazing. Apps are few but fun. Zune Pass is great, too. My only complaint is that sometimes the HD radio reception can be a little dodgy at times. Still, overall this thing sets a new standard for MP3 toys. Bring on more app development!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: it's a fun mp3 player!
customer_reviews.text: The Zune HD is alot better than what I had (Creative Zen). The touch screen responds with one touch of the finger. The colors are simply brilliant. I like the Zune software; user friendly! Two things missing on this device that I had on my Zen are: 1. Sleep timer to shut off unit 2. built in speaker otherwise it is a great player. You can download the alarm clock app which has a sleep timer, but it pauses the music, and doesn't turn unit off, which is ok, but still uses battery.
customer_reviews.author: penguingiraffe

customer_reviews.title: Zune HD 32GB - Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Short and sweet, this is a fantastic mp3 player! It is easy to use with very intuitive controls. The touch screen is responsive without being overly sensitive. The video is excellent and the screen large enough to show detail and still be portable (great for photos and zooming in on detail). downloadable apps is a nice touch, though very limited at this time. If you use this device a lot on the brightest screen setting the battery life is somewhat short. Not a big deal as I plug mine in every night to sync. Overall very satisfied with this purchase - Amazon is awsome as always!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory B. Hott

customer_reviews.title: Best MP3 Player
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing so much. Its a shame that the software to upload music onto it never gets an update. I do get an occasional freeze where it will keep playing music but I wont be able to see anything on the screen. It will just be black, but this is fixed by just restarting the device. UI is easy to learn and the battery life is amazing. Overall, I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron C. Jordon

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product! I have tried the Sony and the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product! I have tried the Sony and the IPOD. By far the Zune is an excellent product and with the large 32GB, I can place many genres of music on it and even watch movies. I absolutely love the ease of WIFI connects and with the optional docking station, I have set it up so that if automatically syncs with my music files and automatically update my music files. With the added feature of HD radio, that makes this an item that is well worth the money and the convenience of having your Music and Videos too!
customer_reviews.author: John L. Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Great present
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas present for my husband and he loves it! The only thing that I don't like (especially since I am an iphone user) is the limited offer on applications. My husband loves the hd radio especially. I was hoping that there is a pandora app for the zune, but the device is not supported by pandora, not even if you access the site over the browser.
customer_reviews.author: Kathrin

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I finally decided to upgrade from my old 30gb zune to the 32gb and I love it!!! I like how thin and light is it from the 1st generation. The graphics are amazing! The touch screen is very easy to use, and the navigation is easy to use too. I always felt that zune is better than apple when it comes to mp3 players for it's uniqueness. And I will continue to buy more mp3 players from zune.
customer_reviews.author: _BriCC

customer_reviews.title: Best mp3 player i've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best mp3 player i've ever used. nice sleek design better looking then most devices today. Works great and holds plenty of songs and videos .One of the best features is how black the black is making other colors really seem to and a very crisp look.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ken

customer_reviews.title: Solid PMP.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much the best PMP you can buy. Sound quality pwns the iPod. OLED screen is amazing. Colors are vibrant and blacks are inky. Menus are easy to navigate and very responsive. I would be lying if I said apps don't matter. While they don't matter to me. They do matter to the vast majority of consumers. The only reason I can think of as to why MS didn't release an SDK was because the Zune HD came out before Windows Phone 7. If they had released and SDK the Zune HD would not only be competing against iOS but also WP7 for developers. Overall it's quality device.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: My first real mp3 player
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot so far. It doesn't have the ga-zillion techy apps that the iPod has yet but that's not something I'm that interested in anyway. The Zune Pass was something I didn't think I would be all that interested in but after the free trial I was hooked. It's really is a damn good deal. My wife loves it too. I've tried to buy her an iPod or other mp3 player several times previously and she's always shrugged it off. Now that I have a Zune HD however she can't wait to get one for herself. We'll probably go for the 16gig version for her.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Borkman

customer_reviews.title: hmmmmm
customer_reviews.text: well its def a step up from the 30gb brick i bought the 32gb hd zune for my boyfriend its a great mp3 player if thats what you need it for. internet is lacking and only has about 20 apps if that many. if you need a mp3 player just for music and video than this is great. zune also has a zune pass 14.99 a month and you can download unlimited amount of music onto your device which is pretty cool vs itunes 99 cents a song.
customer_reviews.author: reyna little

customer_reviews.title: I love my Zune
customer_reviews.text: I love my Zune. I have had 2 and this one was purchased for my husband. Great sound, great battery life.
customer_reviews.author: nikki pruitt

customer_reviews.title: An MP3 worth having
customer_reviews.text: I had the same dinky mp3 for four years. I was more than ready for a change. I wanted a product that fit all my needs and was inexpensive, because I'm a college student on a very tight budget. The Zune works for me because it only costs $10 a month and I can have all the music I want. The down side is that some artists aren't available. This isn't too much of a concern for me, it might be for other people. I recomend this product to all my friends. And I love when people on the bus ask me, "what's that?" I get all excited becuase I get to tell them about a great product.
customer_reviews.author: TrillionJones

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioned within days!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my last one was stolen. For the first couple days/weeks everything worked fine but then it malfunctioned and acted as if it had a mind of it's own. It lowers the volume by itself, it deletes entire albums, and so on. I can't even listen to a full song without something happening. I've tried everything, including asking the seller what was up, and when I called Microsoft they said they couldn't help unless it was bought directly through their website. Long story short, the problem with my zune continues and the seller is no help. I suggest buying it from another seller or from zune directly.
customer_reviews.author: Kalinah

customer_reviews.title: great but lacking
customer_reviews.text: Zune Beautifully put together, with great video and sound quality. Surfing or emailing is abysmal. Using the keyboard impossible. Each key stroke takes several attempts to get the right letter or number. Buying, and downloading music from Zune market, ,and creating play lists in Zune software, is the easiest and best I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: mark weiss

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these before and someone stole it from my car. I bought it again and I loved my old one and this is just as good. It holds my music and my Audio Books. I play them through my car and just love my own choices. Sound is great and ease of use is wonderful, I would recommend it to anyone and if I had to I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and sounds great! Too bad it is a discontinued product.
customer_reviews.author: CKing

customer_reviews.title: Zune HD is a Great Player
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my son. He absolutely loves it! He says it's very easy to use and has great graphics and sound quality. He did say that there are not very many apps or games for it yet, but that was not why he wanted it. He mostly uses it to listen to music. He loves the touch screen and says it is very easy to use. It was somewhat difficult to get the computer to recognize the player was attached, but it did eventually. He has not used it to watch any videos yet, but says he will eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great service
customer_reviews.text: I love my new zune! it is in great condition (not a scratch on it) so rest assured that if you buy a product that is "like new" it will really look brand new. It works great, and came completely empty of content and ready for me to start syncing. unfortunately, I had my zune sent to the wrong address (my fault) and it was returned to the sender. I was bummed and worried, but after sending an email, joporras responded right away and told me they would reship at no charge! they contacted me again when they got my zune back and gave me a new tracking number. I defiantly would shop here again.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great little device! Has just about everything I'll ever need. Pros: Wonderful screen, powerful headphone amp, free apps, and a lot more. Cons: No video out through the mini-jack unlike the older zunes. Its to light and thin, honestly. I hate a speck pixilized case that doubles the thickness and weight of the product which makes it about right. There is no 32 gb black.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: This little device is AWESOME. Zune software can be a bit finicky (at ...
customer_reviews.text: This little device is AWESOME. Zune software can be a bit finicky (at least on windows 8 64bit) to get setup, but I have it working great. Over 35 HQ albums on it and I still have more than 20 GB of space. I couldn't be happier with this MP3 player
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Worm

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I would give the Zune 10 stars out of 5 if i could. the software on the device and on the computer is amazing.. way better than anything else on the market. Sound quality is amazing. WIFI capabilities, can sync music over your network, great video quality, and very durable, mine has lasted through a 7 month deployment and still works with no issues. The only issue is buying speaker docks. you can usually only find them online. everything in stores is usually "Made for ipod".
customer_reviews.author: Korpcake

customer_reviews.title: ZUNE HD!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an avid Microsoft user and I love what they've done with the new Zune interface and even bumped up the volume to 30! I really suggest buying the Zune HD dock so you can watch your favorite movies anytime. I also just like playing music with all of the Artist's photos cycling through the screen. The added Artist's information in the Zune is great and helps me know more about my favorite artists.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I've had it over a year still going strong 24 - 36 hours worth of play time with Wi-Fi off my only real issue with it is is there are no covers for any of the ports and they get dirty easily
customer_reviews.author: Joshua F

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Player
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Zune HD 32Gb because i didn't want anything to do with the Apple Brand. So far i am very impressed with the Zune. Everything is so easy to Sync from my Laptop. The free apps and games, from the Zune Marketplace, are great and there are plenty more out there if you go to the correct sites. The screen colour is amazing and watching a movie is astounding. The screen is so crisp and clear. All the menus are so easy to navigate through and it has organized my music like never before. The 32Gb seems to me to be large enough for my needs. I would really recommend this player to all.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sean Tp Green

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. They are still good after all these years. I'd buy another one in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Skeesick

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: this thing is so cool. have to get the subscription. i get 10 freebies with mine don't think it's still available the ultimate music player you can learn about so much music you're not aware of don't know if i would want it on my phone prefer a dedicated music player do not pay over 300$ for this
customer_reviews.author: Daniel O. Mccabe

customer_reviews.title: adore the zune hd!
customer_reviews.text: Longtime zune owners and lovers. Thrilled with the zune hd as replacement for old zunes. Amazing display and functionality. Zune totally kicks ipod booty. Ease of use, software rules, really awesome. Getting the zune phone (kin two) coming out in a month as well. Movies on the zune hd are great!
customer_reviews.author: mixed.blessings.choose.wisely

customer_reviews.title: Zune HD
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Zune HD for it's high definition radio. I do not believe that other similar players offer high definition radio. Where I live, in a metropolitan neighborhood, we have an excellent, all classical, high definition, public radio station. Reception is excellent. I can not speak to Zune in relation to other similar players because I do not have any experience with other players. Other commentators here have addressed these issues. If you want high definition radio and live in an appropriate area, the Zune HD seems to be the only choice.
customer_reviews.author: Billy D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Overall the Zune is great. I think Microsoft could do more to boost the applications that are offered but the music is great and the podcast are excellent. I bought this for travel to and from Germany and I pretty much watched or listened to the Zune for the entire flight. The battery lasted the entire time and watching the podcast I downloaded did very little to dent the remaining power. The screen is awesome! I am not an Apple fan and when the Zune HD was recommended I looked into it. The Zune won out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zune HD is Great!
customer_reviews.text: I admit Im not an apple guy, although I have had ipods in the past. I was surprised at how small it is. The screen is very clear as well. The touch functionality is very responsive and the overall look of the UI is done very well. Sound quality is as good as ever, but I would like to see a manual eq. Overall, this is a fantastic device. Music, movies(HD out only),radio and slick design, its the best out there. Needs more app support and to work on a Mac to be a 5 star device. They should also put premium headphones in the box! The headphones are garbage!
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic PMP
customer_reviews.text: Microsoft has outdone themselves this time with the Zune HD. Beautiful OLED screen, slick software, 720p output, HD radio, and good web browser. The Zune UI is fantastic, if a little minimalistic at first. The device is very light. I wish that the player would support more video formats, like mkv for HD content. The HD AV dock and Car kit are very good, but overpriced. I hope that Microsoft knows that this needs a great app store, which of the iPod Touch has over this device. The XNA has been opened up to Zune HD developers however.
customer_reviews.author: E. Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: MP3 Player That Plays Great
customer_reviews.text: I love Zune MP3 player by Microsoft. It plays great.
customer_reviews.author: A. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this device. It's very easy to use, it has the built in HD radio, and you can cram a ton of music on it. If you have a small collection, you can fill it up with ease with a zune pass. The only thing I am sad about is it no longer has the ability to share music with another zune user with the search nearby wireless function like the old one...and if you can I can't seem to find that feature. One of the best MP3 players on the market hands down.
customer_reviews.author: J. Coss

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for my son, the previous one was stolen or lost. He really enjoy using this MP3 with no complaints. It arrives well packed and delivery was on time.
customer_reviews.author: cf

customer_reviews.title: Crazy
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of zune for many years, however i do acknowledge the lead of the pack apple. I loved the 2nd gen zune, and the intuitive touch pad. But this takes it to a whole new level, the touch screen is very responsive, way better than the Itouch. The software makes the back and forth of music to main menu to picture and back very quick and easy. the gyros in it that enable the screen flip are very fast. im glad they brought the equalizer back to the 4.0 software. All in all, i love the new zune, and im pretty sure, it has the edge to bring any itouchian to the better side.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy east

customer_reviews.title: Zune HD 32 GB
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an upgrade/replacement for my old 1st generation 30 GB, which died on me. So far I love the Zune HD! I can connect to the marketplace wirelessly to download songs, which is a great convenient feature and the device has been functioning well with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: This is my second Zune.  First HD version, my Zune experience keeps getting better.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Zune HD after losing my previous Zune on a vacation. I decided to get another Zune do to the quality and price difference from Ipod. Plus I have no interest in being another Ipod clone. HD has alot more features than my previous device. I have owned it for 30 days and experience keeps getting better. I the ability to access the internet and the additional games added.
customer_reviews.author: WBSobe74

customer_reviews.title: Screen has beautiful resolution for videos
customer_reviews.text: Need something that holds a bit more than my 4 Gig player. Screen has beautiful resolution for videos. I wish it had an actual equalizer though along with the pre-determined sound settings. Otherwise, I think this is great. Fits my purposes nicely.
customer_reviews.author: DWH

customer_reviews.title: Over all pretty good MP3 player
customer_reviews.text: I really like it overall. It is easy to use and the sound quality is great. I will say though that I was disappointed in the fact that you cannot watch videos on youtube. So the internet access just isn't what I thought it would be. But beside that it is good.
customer_reviews.author: MDeleon

customer_reviews.title: Don't compare to a Ipod Touch
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a new Zune HD and I would definitely recommend buying it, as long as you are not trying to replace a Ipod touch... The 32gb Ipod touch is worth around $270 The 32gb Zune HD is worth $180 Those ninety dollars make a huge difference in appstore, websurfing friendliness and less bugs. Rather compare the Zunehd to an apple product with the same price...THe ipod nano. In this the zune wins no questions asked. But if the appstore, websurfing friendliness and not having to deal with bugs then I would spend the extra dollars on the touch. A zune simply can't compete with it yet
customer_reviews.author: ladanielson

customer_reviews.title: Why Buy an IPod?
customer_reviews.text: I looked carefully at the iPod and the Zune and concluded the Zune is more ruggedly built, better looking and offers everything you could want in a high-end MP3 Player. I am a Windows PC user and the integration with the Windows Media Player and the Zune Software is seamless. Just wish the unit had Bluetooth but that's not a show stopper. I look forward to getting the HD AV Dock to make the unit work with HD TVs and component sound equipment. I am confused by reviews of the FM Radio HD Car Pack. Other than that confusion I am very pleased so far (about one month).
customer_reviews.author: Mr Engr

customer_reviews.title: Zune is great
customer_reviews.text: Great shape and sad these are no longer available. Much easier and user friendly than major competitor, better graphics. Just a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dora Makse

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Another great Christmas gift.. Product as described and fast shipping... Ordered it years ago to watch movies and listen to music works great and has been handed down still running great
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Zunehead For life!
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best, lasts forever, music so do great, just perfect. Subscription service beats iTunes anyday. Zune for life!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: A welcome upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Have had one of the Zune "bricks" for several years and am excited about having a smaller, more user-friendly version. My old one is 30 GB and getting near capacity.
customer_reviews.author: thomas01

customer_reviews.title: Zune HD 32MB
customer_reviews.text: Best alternative for the price in this range of memory capacity. Only reason for 4 stars is that there is not software to use on Mac where all music is stored, have to use emulation software to access. Beautiful screen with excellent UI. Replay of video is also beautiful and thanks to large capacity can carry several at a time. Compact size, charges fast, accessories may not be easy to find in stores but probably cheaper thru Amazon anyway. Have not used radio yet but this can only be a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael

customer_reviews.title: I think it is far superior to the IPod
customer_reviews.text: I still cant figure out why Microsoft stopped making the zune. I think it is far superior to the IPod, but that's just me.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Stuckey

customer_reviews.title: Underrated
customer_reviews.text: The Zune HD is a great product for its value. Microsoft has really allowed the Zune to be a music player first as opposed to other media players who focus on internet and applications. For the music lover, this product is bar none the best music player on the market. Beautiful user interface, screen quality. Gives artist information on demand without disrupting music play, allows applications and games to be played, though limited selection available on the marketplace. Bottom line, if you want a PMP for listening to music, this is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: N. Adamski

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied so far...
customer_reviews.text: The product was in very good physical condition upon receipt of the product. As far as the performance of the device, I did have one scare, the screen went black on me and I wasn't able to press any buttons, pause music, or turn down the volume. The device had to be turned off, then back on. After that, there weren't any further issues. That happened only once out of the three and a half months that I've owned the device.
customer_reviews.author: Widow

customer_reviews.title: awesome evolution
customer_reviews.text: this product has exceeded my expectations in practically every way. from the crisp vivid screen, to the easy to navigate and sexy UI, to the design of the device, sound quality, browser. it is an excellent experience. while there might be more to want (mainly in the apps department) microsoft's zune team has in the past been quite good about expanding what the player has to offer.
customer_reviews.author: Adil Tajgeer

customer_reviews.title: OK tool
customer_reviews.text: Good but can have glitches when playing music. Skips songs.
customer_reviews.author: J J

customer_reviews.title: best mp3 player on market
customer_reviews.text: As a music player I love the Zune. I like how it organizes things, I like how it navigates, and I really like the Zunepass. It is small/light enough for gym use, and the sound quality seems limited more by the supplied headphones, and less by the unit itself. video works well, and the screen is rather pleasant to look at. Like most touch video electronics, the Zune HD is hard to see in bright sunlight. The applications work but are extremely limited. The Zune is a fantastic media player, but doesn't do much else.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my bf. He already had a Zune (the original one) and he loved it, but when I got him this one, he was ecstatic. Overall the player is awesome. The picture quality is beautiful. The sounds is great. So easy to maneuver. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Quicky delivery, good quality. Needed a little TLC but otherwise good condition for a used product. The only problem is that I can not get any videos to load on to it and that was the main purpose of the purchase. No problems putting music or pictures on it. Took a while to delete all the previous owners pictures and music off of it.
customer_reviews.author: mommyof2

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT buy this item if you have windows 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT buy this item if you have windows 10 it will not work do your research first my husband wanted a zune hd and after reading all kinds of comments it will not load he keeps getting a error code research first what it is compatible with first
customer_reviews.author: claudette graves

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked the Zune products and I have always wanted to get the Zune HD. Now that I have it, I am satisfied with the product and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Moticha Franklin

customer_reviews.title: One of the best HD players out there
customer_reviews.text: After using this for about 6 months i would say this it is an excellent mp3 and video player especially for the price. It might not share the same features as the ipod touch but is one the of the best competitors.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pham

customer_reviews.title: what did i wait for?  zune rocks, add the zune pass and xbox live, can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: yes, get this product if you are a fan of music and want to rediscover this love over and over again. get marketplace and xbox live rallying along with the zune and you've got one mean media player. HD is unbelievable and loading youtube downloader to your PC and all the great vids are even better on the hd OLED display the 32 GB carries. searching artists, albums and even following zune picks, lead one into all the music one could need. give this a try, you'll be greatly surprised and pleased in finding so.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Mattingly II

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier with this media player
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this media player. It has been by my side since Black Friday of 2010. What can I say? It has radio, the battery lasts forever, it is slim and weighs close to nothing. Too bad they got discontinued by Microsoft.
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Gadget
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I wish it had an external speaker and a slightly bigger screen. The clarity of the screen is great and it is very thin. My kids have also had fun on it so I would say that it is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K.

customer_reviews.title: Hey Mikey, He likes it
customer_reviews.text: Love the storage space and the HD Radio Works well downloading music and much easier then the ipod. Wife liked it better then her ipod and bought one too. Her ipod was full at 8g and this is 32g and cost less
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of my Zune HD! It will be 3 years in June and I have not had any problems with it. I've loaded & removed music and video to my Zune from day 1!!! I highly recommend this device. I'm looking for a good deal on a 64 gb :)
customer_reviews.author: Trevor James

customer_reviews.title: Zune HD 30 GB
customer_reviews.text: Product satisfies almost every category imaginable very well, but is prone to freezing after constant everyday use, at which point one can do nothing but let the device's battery run off. While the internet works great, the software does not allow one to look at online videos of any kind, and sometimes pictures are out of the question as well, depending on the site. When it comes to looks, music quality and sound, and other media viewing,(Videos, pictures) the device is miles away from comparable Ipod devices.
customer_reviews.author: jacopo

customer_reviews.title: I Love the Zune
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Zune. The other two had batteries that died. I replaced the batteries and they still work. This is smaller and lighter than the other two. I have them in my cars. They work great with Fords SYNC system.
customer_reviews.author: TMAC

customer_reviews.title: love this MP3
customer_reviews.text: it is rather expensive but it has all the features you could want for a small take along that fits in your pocket. it can store all the music and pictures you can think of.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Mae

customer_reviews.title: Noice
customer_reviews.text: stunning hd picture the audios quieter than ipod itself but for the money saved on this item for the quality the look and the name itself it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Or Unhappy

customer_reviews.title: Zune HD
customer_reviews.text: I had this for since it came out about 2 months ago. It is far better than the old generation zune. High quality product. great sound, very stylish. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Hernan R. Erazo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great MP3 player. It's a shame it's discontinued and software updates are gone.
customer_reviews.author: JW

product_meta.title: Zune HD 32 GB Video MP3 Player (Platinum)
product_meta.description:
Zune is the premium digital experience that gives you access to the latest in entertainment and technology, allowing you to enjoy, connect, and discover content in a whole new way the way you like it. Browse, stream, buy, and play all you want, including music, HD video, podcasts, games, and much more. Gain the freedom to enjoy your entertainment , Zune brings your content up front, so you're always in control.

AMAZON.COM
Zune is the premium digital experience that gives you access to the latest in entertainment and technology, allowing you to enjoy, connect, and discover content in a whole new way--the way you like it. Browse, stream, buy, and play all you want, including music, HD video, podcasts, games, and much more. Gain the freedom to enjoy your entertainment; Zune brings your content up front, so you're always in control. 



Instant entertainment that you control. Click to enlarge.

Browse, stream, buy, and play all you want, including music, HD video, podcasts, games, and much more. Click to enlarge.

With a 3.3-inch size and vivid 16:9 display, truer and brighter entertainment is at your fingertips. Click to enlarge.

Weighs just 2.6 ounces and is only 8.9 mm thick. Click to enlarge.



INSTANT ENTERTAINMENT THAT YOU CONTROL
 * HD Radio Technology: More Stations, better sound, no fees 
 * HD-compatible Video: High-quality video on the go or on your HDTV 
 * Internet Browsing: News, email, traffic? It's all in your pocket. 
 * OLED Touchscreen: Wide view with a special touch 
 * Games: More games, more fun 



ZUNE HD
Portable perfection
The new Zune HD wireless media player takes you closer and connects you to a whole new world of entertainment. With built-in HD Radio receiver, HD-compatible video, multi-touch navigation, OLED screen, and games, Zune HD delivers the next level in music and video experiences.

 * Zune HD 32 GB: Holds up to 10 hours of high definition video; 48 hours of standard definition video; 8,000 songs; or 25,000 pictures. Available in Platinum. 

HD Radio Technology


 * The new Zune HD gives you access to many local HD Radio stations with crystal-clear digital sound at no extra cost. Receive additional channels from your local stations and get more of the content you love, including sports, news, and music, in various genres and formats. 
 * Like something you hear on HD Radio? Song tagging technology allows you to buy the song if you are connected to a Wi-Fi network or to tag it for later purchase. 
 * Click here for more information about HD Radio. 

HD-compatible Video


 * Watch HD movies, TV shows, and more on your HDTV directly from your Zune HD. Just connect via the Zune HD AV Dock to your HDTV (both sold separately) to watch 720p HD video. The Zune HD also will play your videos on the go in its sharp, brilliant OLED screen. Videos on the player are downscaled to fit the screen at 480 x 272--not HD resolution. 

Quickplay


 * Get instant access to your stuff with shortcuts to favorites, recently downloaded or played music, videos, and more. Quickplay cuts through the clutter and brings up front the content that you care about most. 

Games


 * Loaded with multi-touch and accelerometer, the Zune HD player makes portable gaming even more exciting. Download from Zune's catalog of free games and popular titles--play them all to the sound of your favorite music. 

OLED Touchscreen


 * Get instant access to your content with multi-touch navigation. With a 3.3-inch size and vivid 16:9 display (480 x 272 resolution), truer and brighter entertainment is at your fingertips. 

Wireless


 * Zune HD allows you to buy, stream, and update your music--and download free games--wirelessly via a Wi-Fi connection. Feeling entangled? Wirelessly sync your Zune HD to your home PC via your home network. You also can stream millions of songs over Wi-Fi directly to your Zune HD and turn it into a portable digital jukebox. 

Internet Browsing


 * Surf the web anytime, anywhere you have a Wi-Fi connection. Enjoy your favorite websites with a well-featured web browser, including tap-to-zoom technology, built-in accelerometer, and touchscreen QWERTY keyboard. 

Zune Marketplace


 * Download free Zune software to access Zune Marketplace from your PC. Download or stream new music, rent the latest movies, buy TV shows, and watch free trailers and previews--plus thousands of audio and video podcasts. You also can download from our catalog of free games including classic and other popular titles. 

Expand Your Entertainment with Xbox 360


 * Zune features movies, TV shows, and more in both high and standard definition. Browse and watch from thousands of titles for rent, or purchase available instantly through Microsoft's Smooth Streaming technology. Buy videos once and watch on multiple screens: on your Xbox 360, Zune player, and PC. See www.xbox.com/live for system requirements. The convenience of on-demand, only on Xbox 360. 



ACCESSORIES (SOLD SEPARATELY)
Zune HD AV Dock
This all-in-one package enables Zune HD players to charge, sync, and play supported 720p HD videos on HDTVs. Send music to your home audio systems and control it all via a wireless remote.

Zune Premium Car Pack
Charge and play music, podcasts, and HD Radio stations from your Zune HD while you drive. The FM transmitter/car charger auto-seeks the best available frequency on your car stereo. A USB port located on the transmitter/car charger allows you to charge a second Zune player simultaneously.

Zune Sync Cable
Charge your Zune player and sync with your collection on your PC.

Zune Charge Pack
The Zune AC Adapter fast-charges your Zune player up to 70% within an hour. Folding blades make it easy to travel with. Use the included USB cable to sync with a PC.

Zune Power Pack
Connect your AV cable to your docked Zune HD to play music, HD Radio broadcasts, and audio podcasts through your home audio system. The HDMI cable connects your docked Zune HD to HDTVs to view movies and videos. Also includes Zune AC Adapter; Zune HD player and Zune HD AV Dock sold separately.

Zune Sync Dock
Connect to your PC and sync your collection while you charge your Zune in style. Control from a distance with the included wireless remote, which gives you full access to your Zune player from anywhere in the room.
feature_bullets: To get started using Zune HD, download the latest software to your PC from zune.net/setup and charge your Zune
32 GB capacity for up to 8,000 songs, 48 hours standard definition video, or 10 hours high definition video
3.3-inch OLED screen with 480 x 272 resolution and 16:9 display
HD Radio gives you access to many local stations with crystal-clear digital sound at no extra cost
Watch supported 720p HD movies, TV shows, and videos in high definition
Buy, stream, and update your music, download free games, and surf the web via a Wi-Fi connection
NOTE: In order for headphones to work properly, insert jack into device port until it clicks into place
